price: A onaj ko želi neku drugu vjeru osim islama, neće mu biti primljena, i on će na drugom svijetu biti među gubitnicima.
arabic: وَمَن يَبۡتَغِ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِ دِينٗا فَلَن يُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman yabtaghi ghayra al-is'lāmi dīnan falan yuq'bala min'hu wahuwa fī al-ākhirati mina al-khāsirīna
